summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Wednesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 8
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Wednesday, with three gaining and the other 16 declining.
Bitcoin fell 1.6% to $22,843 by market close.
